title: The Saving Power of Beauty with Gabriel
description:
Today I have a conversation with my friend Gabriel about Beauty. The conversation focuses heavily on the transcendentals and how their order shapes things. We also explore beauty in art and story telling and the power it has to save. It is one of my favorite conversations to date and I hope you enjoy it!

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/theinfoaddict
